```{r}

missing_value = function(x) {
  if (is.numeric(x)) {
    y = mean(x, na.rm = TRUE)
    x = replace(x, is.na(x), y)
  } else if (is.character(x)) {
    x = replace(x, is.na, "virginica")
  }
}





missing_value(iris_with_missing)
```
